document_data.caption: A map showing Aka Way and surroundings in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Aka Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Aka Way''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Aka Way was located in the northern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. The road originated on the western side of [[Bazaar Street]] branching southwest and continuing briefly before ending on [[Tharleon Street]]. [[Marlar's Lane]] connected with Aka Way.
